dct_description_sm: Map shows provincial; district; planning area; municipal or township; property; and cadastral boundaries. Map shows cadastral boundaries, mosques, and major features. Relief shown by contours with 5 foot interval. "(N.A. 36, P IV 65⁹)" "Heights in feet." "Surveyed (July 1958) and drawn (January 1959) by Lands and Surveys Department, Uganda." "Crown copyright reserved." "The representation on this map of a road, track or footpath is no evidence of a right of way." "Cadastral boundaries as shown on this map do not in any way affect the boundaries shown in Registered Titles." "300-3/59."
dct_creator_sm: Uganda. Department of Lands and Surveys
